title: Racism
body:
Can anyone tell me how to report racism?
Those statements about racism occurred in LOL client chat, and I have the complete copy of the chat.

replies.body: That would come under hate speech - That's what I use for those problems.

> [{quoted}](name=Hopes  Thief,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=7gxpQlGx,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-05-30T14:41:35.180+0000)
>
> That would come under hate speech - That's what I use for those problems.

"KEEP YOUR HATE SPEECH OFF THIS CAMPUS!" - Trigglypuff 2016
But it occurred on client chat, not the game...

Hey

Can you please raise a ticket and supply the chat logs? We can then take any required actions.

Thanks for helping stop racist behaviour.

> [{quoted}](name=GeneralCoxy,realm=OCE,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=7gxpQlGx,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-05-31T03:08:07.517+0000)
>
> Hey
> 
> Can you please raise a ticket and supply the chat logs? We can then take any required actions.
> 
> Thanks for helping stop racist behaviour.

I've done this on a few occasions. The most recent one where I was told to "go die in a hole" and I'm a "f#%@*^! scrub ass c#^&". Submitted a ticket with a screen shot and all. You think anything happened? Nope, same guys is still playing today without a chat restriction or anything. I very much doubt Riot does anything and the only action taken is when it's processed through the automated system.

If it occurred during the game or in pre/post game chat, you can report players in the end game screen under "hate speech" as well as provide a note in the box provided stating which part of the chat it was (pre/post game chats are manually reviewed so punishment can take a lil longer than the in-game automatic detection). 

If it occurred out of game, [please send in a support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to Riot detailing exactly what happened, and any evidence you may have.

Please keep in mind that player support is busy and it may take a lil while for them to get back to you (almost always reply within a week). During this time do not lodge multiple tickets or continue adding information to your existing ticket, as it may send your enquiry to the back of the queue.

Also please keep in mind that Riot are unable to tell you if the player receives punishment due to privacy reasons.

Racism shouldn't be tolerated at all. But it's sad that it goes on ;-;

The adults should act more like their age and be the bigger person.
The children ( age < 16), they should be more careful of their words, as their saltiness can get the better of them.

Racism shouldn't be tolerated, *AT ALL*
